message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $8,500 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but the product's value is much higher than that.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I still feel strongly that $8,500 would be a fair price for the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
